Title: The Subway
Plot: Everyone has an uncommon experience while going their separate ways on the subway. George meets a beautiful woman who distracts him from his intended destination, a job interview. Jerry falls asleep and then wakes up across from a fat naked man and winds up discussing with him, the New York Mets & Coney Island. Elaine's train stops in the middle of a tunnel on her way to be best man at a lesbian wedding. Kramer overhears a hot tip on a horse on his way to pay $600 in traffic violations.
GuestStars: Barbara Stock, Rhoda Gemignani, Mark Boone Jr., Christopher Collins, Daryl Roach, Barry Vigon, Joe Restivo, Chet Nelson, Ernie Sabella
